content: --निद्रा {1} a state of half contemplation and half sleep, a state between sleep and wakefulness; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} light sleep; योगनिद्रां गतस्य मम <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; <ls>H. 3. 75</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 41.</ls> {2} particularly, the sleep of Viṣṇu at the end of a Yuga; <ls>R. 10. 14</ls>; <ls n="R.">13. 6.</ls> {3} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā.
